page.title: 01SUMMARY OF THE BLOCK
page.content: This block consists of the town of { {Petersfield}with the villages of { {Sheet, Steep}and part of{Stroud. }The surrounding area is mainly farmland with a belt of woodland in the North- West corner. Petersfield is a market town of almost 11 000 people on the main A3 road between London and Portsmouth. It is 54 miles to London. The cities of Portsmouth, Winchester, Chichester and Guildford are all about 20 miles away. The railway station is quite busy, as many people work in London or Portsmouth. The journey to Waterloo station takes a little over an hour. Market days are on Wednesday and Saturday.
